events.message: I received the smartphone yesterday but the screen has multiple scratches and it seems faulty. I am quite disappointed with the condition.
The reported issue has been reviewed and classified under product defect due to scratches found on the device screen.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle this case regarding the damaged smartphone.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the scratched screen on your new phone. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and confirm the order number so we can proceed with the next steps?
I have attached the photos showing the scratched screen. My order number is 987654321. I was really expecting a new phone in perfect condition.
Thank you for the information and photos. We can offer you a replacement device shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement phone as soon as possible. Please let me know the next steps for return and delivery.
We have processed the replacement order and sent you a prepaid return label for the damaged phone. The new device will be delivered within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the replacement phone and everything is working perfectly now. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we assume the replacement resolved your issue. Closing the case now but please reach out anytime if you need help.
